creator: frederic.borry@airbus.com
text:
To perform full deployment process of our applications with ant, we would need a
task to generate ISO cd image files.

creator: stevel@apache.org
text: Are there any java classes to do this?

(In reply to comment #1)
> Are there any java classes to do this? 
Yes (http://www.i2rd.com/CDEveryWhere/product.shtml) but I could not find any
open-source one.
We will probably use an exec with a native Windows command line tool
(http://www.nu2.nu/bcd/) as our delivery process is performed on Windows platform.
creator: frederic.borry@airbus.com

text:
yes, for you <exec> is the solution. For Ant to support it, we'd really need
something really ubquitous, such as stuff in every OS that we can use. 

Leaving the bug open for now, though LATER may be a better filing. I can see the
appeal of ISO generation;
creator: stevel@apache.org
